display_long_description:
Live, bark, and explore in I Am Dog: Puppy Madness the ultimate dog simulator game for Meta Quest 3, Quest 2, and the Meta Horizon Store. Step into the paws of a playful puppy and experience the funniest, most immersive virtual dog adventure in VR.

Run, jump, dig, and bark your way through a world full of toys, humans, and hilarious chaos. Chase balls, fetch sticks, chew everything, and cause adorable mayhem in a lively dog playground powered by realistic VR physics. Every wag, movement, and sound feels alive in this virtual reality dog simulator built for pure fun.

Explore open parks, cozy homes, and interactive spaces where every object reacts to your actions. Discover the freedom of living a true dog life play, explore, rest, or make trouble. From funny moments to relaxing exploration, it’s the perfect mix of humor, realism, and VR pet simulation.

With smooth controls, family-friendly gameplay, and next-gen graphics, this dog VR experience brings joy to all ages. Whether you’re a dog lover, a VR gamer, or just looking for a hilarious animal simulator, this game delivers endless fun and puppy chaos.

Experience the joy, freedom, and madness of being a dog in one of the most entertaining VR simulation games ever created — only in I Am Dog: Puppy Madness VR!
